SA11sanss07u:458_0: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati /
SA11sanss07u:462_0: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmâbhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet //
SA11sanss07u:464_0: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā //
SA11sanss07u:466_0: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyântarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt /
SA11sanss07u:467_0: tad yathâpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyôdakabindor nântarâsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna /
